The dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key or null.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the GUID associated with the current object (stored in the property) with the GUID associated with the object.
member.returns: true if the objects are same; otherwise returns false.
member.param: An object that needs to be compared with the current object. Must not be null.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a unique hash code for the current object’s GUID (stored in the Value property).
member.returns: The unique hash code.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.InvalidKey
member.summary: Returns an invalid object. An invalid object has Guid.Empty value for the property and a false value for the property.
member.returns: An invalid instance key.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the instance key is valid.
member.returns: true if the instance key is valid; otherwise false. An instance key is valid if and only if its GUID (stored in the Value property) is not Guid.Empty.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key.
member.returns: The dictionary that contains metadata associated with the instance key. This dictionary is a read-only dictionary.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey.Value

member.name: T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState
member.summary: This enumeration contains a list of states of an instance.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is in Unknown state.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState.Uninitialized
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is uninitialized. An uninitialized instance is an instance that has never been persisted.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState.Initialized
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is initialized. An initialized instance is an instance that has been persisted at least once and can be persisted again in the future.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState.Completed
member.summary: Indicates that the instance is in completed state. A completed instance cannot be persisted again in the future.
